Package org.forgerock.openidm.audit.util

Class RouterActivityLogger

java.lang.Object
org.forgerock.openidm.audit.util.RouterActivityLogger
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActivityLogger
public class RouterActivityLogger extends Object implements ActivityLogger
Creates an audit activity log message using the router.

  • Method Details

    • log

      public void log(org.forgerock.services.context.Context context, org.forgerock.json.resource.Request request, String message, String objectId, org.forgerock.json.JsonValue before, org.forgerock.json.JsonValue after, Status status) throws org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException
      Write an activity audit log.
      Specified by:
      log in interface ActivityLogger
      Parameters:
      context - the context of the request to log
      request - the request to log
      message - the message to log with this request
      objectId - the resourceId being operated on
      before - the object value "before" the request
      after - the object value "after" the request
      status - the status of the operation
      Throws:
      org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException - on failure to write to audit log unless suppressed.
